title: Cloud Infrastructure
subtitle: Docker containerization with GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
description: Docker containerization with GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and automated Kubernetes deployments

content.overview: Comprehensive cloud infrastructure platform that enables scalable and reliable application deployments.
content.challenge: Modern applications require complex infrastructure requirements for scalability and reliability.
content.solution: Automated CI/CD pipelines and containerized applications with Kubernetes orchestration.
